summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeLive life tangle-free with Kenra's Platinum Pearl Detangler. This milky detangling spray, with luminescent pearl, adds moisture, slip and shine for effortless manageability. It also helps protect against thermal damage, unlocking remarkable radiance.
details: DetailsItem 2579700How To UseShake well. As Prep: Spray liberally on towel-dried hair. Comb through before styling. As Style Refresher: Use as needed for added moisture and shine.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Glycerin, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Pearl Powder, Hydrolyzed Vegetable Protein, Pg-Propyl Silanetriol, Panthenol, Calcium, Sodium Borosilicate, Titanium Dioxide, Tin Oxide, Polysorbate 80, Ceteareth-7, Ceteareth-25, Lactic Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Amodimethicone/Morpholinomethyl Silsesquioxane Copolymer, Trideceth-5, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum).
how_to_use: Shake well. As Prep: Spray liberally on towel-dried hair. Comb through before styling. As Style Refresher: Use as needed for added moisture and shine.

reviews.headline: No
reviews.comments: This did not make my hair softer or help with frizz it made it feel dry with product in it.would not buy this again and if I had not thrown my receipt away I would return it

reviews.headline: A one time purchase
reviews.comments: I love the scent and the product is smooth but the spray bottle is too wide. I spray my hair it gets on the floor more than my hair. A more narrow end would be best. And the product does more detangling easier.

reviews.headline: I want to like it butâ€¦
reviews.comments: I want to like this- i do! I love the Kenra blow dry spray. But the pump doesnt work. :( It's so thick it gets stuck in the pump.

reviews.headline: Would not buy again
reviews.comments: I love Kenra products but this for me is definitely not something I would purchase again. The smell is overpowering and awful. The smell lingers like a bad headache. Sorry Kenra.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: We use this sparingly because of the price but still a very good product. Cheap detanglers do not work on my kids' very curly hair. I like using this to comb through their hair, then the Pattern leave in conditioner once it's all combed through. It also smells SO good!

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Ive been using the biolage detangler for years and decided to switch it up. I absolutely love this product. Its a smaller bottle than what im use to and the product goes quick, but I think its worth it. Also I saw a bunch of other neg reviews abouy the scent. I actually LOVE the scent, it reminds me of a victoria secret type scent.

reviews.headline: Silky Smooth
reviews.comments: My hair is pin straight and summer humidity has the ends looking a little frazzled. This spray is light weight, has a faint but pleasant smell and works very well leaving my hair silky with no static. Id originally tried this because they had a promotion where you got a free bottle with any kenra purchase and I fell in love, I just wish it wasn't so pricey.

reviews.headline: How do i write a review if i still dont have my delivery?
reviews.comments: Can't

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: This product works well and smells nice. I would definitely buy again.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Love this!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Its smells so good and i don't struggle when i comb my hair

reviews.headline: Kenra name brand but lacks quality.
reviews.comments: Would not recommend this product. Did not help with detailing. Super disappointed with it.

reviews.headline: Smells Bad
reviews.comments: It smells like old lady perfume. Definitely not the traditional kenra scent. Doesn't do much for the hair either as far as hydration or detangling.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: This is a holy grail for me!! I can not live without it - THIS IS YOUR SIGN TO BUY xoXo

reviews.headline: Amazing!!!
reviews.comments: This product is amazing.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I dont know why people say they don't like the smell, i LOVE it! It smells like Kirkland's and I love that store lol. I have long, fine hair and this detangles it before I blow dry and makes blow drying faster and easier without weighing my hair down.

reviews.headline: PLEASE do not listen to these other reviewers.
reviews.comments: I have always used "Its a 10" leave in and my hair has always been shiny and soft. My tride and true. I saw it in the store and it smelt amazing and had super cute packaging so I decided to change it up and grab it in a pinch. Oh my god. This is aweful. My first time use i immediately noticed I could barely comb through my hair. It dehydrated my hair so badly. Absolutely not worth it - the worst product I think Ive.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Totally underwhelmed with this product. Seems to do nothing other than make my hair and bathroom smell like old lady perfume. Purchased during the half price sale or I would have returned ASAP but will keep it and try again once in awhile. I just don't understand why products need to be so strongly scented, to the point where I'm hesitant to use my perfume!

reviews.headline: I will continue to purchase this product.
reviews.comments: Loved it. Made hair feel like silk.

reviews.headline: Saved my hair
reviews.comments: No more tangles. Soft manageable hair. Smells nice.

media.headline: I would but this product again

faceoff_positive.comments: My hair is naturally curly, but I blow dry and flat iron it every week. I've been loving the Kenra Platinum Luxe One Leave-in as my leave-in conditioner and main heat protectant, but this weekend I decided to try the Platinum Pearl Detangler in its place.  I saw a lot of reviews here about people not liking the smell, and perhaps that's more of an issue when you apply it to wet hair and leave it to air dry, but I found the scent to be  tolerable and it was barely noticeable after I blow dried my hair.  I used a generous amount on wet hair and then followed with a little bit of Kenra Blow-Dry Spray heat protectant, as I always do when doing my silk press.  The Pearl product left my hair super shiny and silky and soft after my blow dry and flat iron was complete.  I didn't use any other products as leave-ins or heat protectants than this and the blow-dry spray.  The only other product that gives me this good of a result with the silk press is the other one I mentioned  - the Luxe One leave-in which has tiny bits of gold in it.  From now own, I will just alternate between the pearl and the gold when doing my silk presses.  I love many Kenra products, but not all of them equally, so I wouldn't bother to write a rave review of this if I wasn't truly impressed.  100% satisfaction for this product in a silk press situation!
faceoff_positive.headline: Works great for a silk press.

faceoff_negative.comments:
I was very excited about this product from
The positive reviews I had read, but the first time I used it, I could not comb my hair out? It created tangles vs detangling. I thought it would maybe dry nice after, but my hair was harder to dry, remained tangly and it felt dry and straw-like when fully dry which is never does normally. I thought maybe it was a fluke, so I tried it again about a week later and the exact same thing happened to the point that I had to braid my hair for the day instead of even wearing it down because it was so unmanageable. I love their other products but I'm
not quite sure what happened with this one for my hair.
faceoff_negative.headline: Made my hair harder to comb through
